QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, note_date, case when encid = '' or encid is null then NULL else cast(replace(encid, 'E0000','') as bigint) end as VisitOccurrenceId, drug_name, reason_general from {sc}.nlp_drug_rationale JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where drug_name is not null and (drug_action is null or drug_action not in ('STOP', 'TAKE.NOT', 'ON.NOT', 'SWITCH FROM', 'AVOID', 'REMOVE', 'REMAIN OFF', 'START.NOT', 'GET.NOT', 'TRY.NOT')) AND (sentiment is null or sentiment not in ('REJECT', 'NEED.NOT', 'WANT.NOT')) order by cast(replace(ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
